item.title: iPhone 17 Pro 橙色变粉色，苹果着手调查
item.guid: iPhone-17-Pro-橙色变粉色，苹果着手调查
item.description:
According to AppleInsider, recently, some "Cosmic Orange" iPhone 17 Pro models have experienced a gradual color shift from orange to pink, drawing user attention. 据 AppleInsider 报道，近日，部分「星宇橙」配色的 iPhone 17 Pro 出现了机身颜色逐渐由橙色转为粉色的情况，引发用户关注。

Currently, Apple has not publicly responded, only emphasizing proper cleaning methods in its support documents. However, industry insiders believe the issue may stem from flaws in the "sealing" stage of the anodizing process for the device's aluminum body. 目前，苹果方面尚未公开回应，仅在支持文档中强调了正确的清洁方式，但业内人士认为问题可能源于机身铝材在阳极氧化工艺中的「封孔」环节出现瑕疵。

The report indicates that the iPhone 17 Pro features an aluminum alloy body, achieving its "Cosmic Orange" color through an anodizing process. This process involves forming a porous oxide layer on the aluminum surface, then fixing the color through dyeing and sealing. If the sealing is incomplete, external liquids, oils, or sunlight exposure could lead to color changes. 报道指出，iPhone 17 Pro 采用铝合金机身，并通过阳极氧化工艺实现「宇宙橙」配色。该工艺需要在铝材表面形成多孔氧化层，再通过染色与封孔固定颜色。如果封孔不完全，外界液体、油脂或阳光照射都可能导致颜色变化。

Currently, users have shared photos on social media showing the device's color uniformly fading, resulting in a "rose gold" like effect. Some affected users have replaced their devices through after-sales service, with the returned units being collected by Apple for engineering team analysis. 目前已有用户在社交平台分享照片，显示机身颜色均匀褪变，呈现出类似「粉金」的效果。部分受影响用户已通过售后更换新机，相关设备被苹果回收用于工程团队分析。

The report speculates that this issue only affects a small number of product batches, and Apple may correct the process in subsequent production. 报道推测，该问题仅出现在少量批次产品，苹果可能会在后续生产中修正工艺。

item.title: 车主回应理想 MEGA 上海起火：「电池包磕碰」属谣言
item.guid: 车主回应理想-MEGA-上海起火：「电池包磕碰」属谣言
item.description:
According to a report by "Red Star Capital Bureau," late on the 23rd, an Li Auto MEGA suddenly caught fire while driving in Xuhui District, Shanghai. Videos show that while the vehicle was in normal operation, sparks suddenly erupted from its underside, and the fire quickly spread, ultimately burning the entire vehicle down to its frame. Fortunately, the two occupants were able to stop the car in time and escape safely. 据「红星资本局」报道，23 日深夜，上海徐汇区一辆理想 MEGA 在行驶过程中突然起火。视频显示，车辆在正常行驶时车底突然爆出火花，火势随即迅速蔓延，最终整车被烧成空架。所幸车内两名驾乘人员及时停车并顺利逃生。

Li Auto responded, stating: "Currently, the driver and all passengers have safely exited the vehicle. The manufacturer has arranged for dedicated personnel to go to the scene for handling, and the fire department has also intervened in the investigation. We will actively cooperate and carry out follow-up work based on the investigation results." 理想汽车方面回应称：「目前驾驶员和全体乘客均已安全离车，厂家已安排专人前往现场处理，消防部门也已介入调查，我们将积极配合并依据调查结果开展后续工作。」

On October 24, Shanghai Shenhui Law Firm, entrusted by car owner Mr. Hao Peng, issued a solemn statement regarding the Li Auto MEGA spontaneous combustion incident. 10 月 24 日，上海市申汇律师事务所接受车主郝鹏先生委托，发布关于该起理想 MEGA 自燃事件的严正声明。

The statement pointed out that at approximately 9:30 PM on October 23, when the vehicle was traveling to the intersection of Hechuan Road and Caobao Road in Minhang District, Shanghai, an explosive abnormal sound came from the chassis, and smoke quickly filled the car. The driver and owner made an emergency escape; during the process, the rear electric doors could not be opened immediately, and they ultimately escaped through the front passenger door. The vehicle and its contents were completely destroyed, but there were no casualties. 声明指出，10 月 23 日晚 21 时 30 分许，车辆行驶至上海市闵行区合川路与漕宝路路口时，底盘传来爆炸异响，车内迅速烟雾弥漫。司机与车主紧急逃生，过程中后排电动车门未能立即开启，最终通过副驾驶车门脱险。车辆及车内财物完全烧毁，但无人员伤亡。

The law firm emphasized that claims circulating online such as 'battery pack collision,' 'modification of small battery leading to fire,' and 'malfunction occurred on the day of the accident but was not repaired' are all false statements. This incident was a sudden spontaneous combustion accident, and the specific cause is still awaiting investigation and determination by relevant departments. 律师事务所强调，网络上传播的「电池包磕碰」、「改动小电瓶导致起火」、「事故当天已出现故障但未维修」等说法均为不实言论。本事件系突发自燃事故，具体原因仍待相关部门调查认定。

At the same time, the statement sternly demands an end to so-called 'rights protection' or promotional activities carried out under the guise of the car owner, and relevant infringers will be held legally accountable. 同时，声明严正要求杜绝冒用车主名义进行所谓「维权」或宣传行为，相关侵权者将依法追责。

Public information shows that the Li Auto MEGA is Li Auto's first pure electric MPV. Since its launch last year, its sales have fluctuated due to public controversy, but starting this year, it has maintained sales leadership for several consecutive months in the pure electric vehicle market above 500,000 yuan and the MPV market. 公开资料显示，理想 MEGA 是理想汽车首款纯电 MPV，自去年推出以来曾因舆论争议导致销量波动，但今年起在 50 万元以上纯电车型和 MPV 市场中连续数月保持销量领先。

item.title: 雷军回应 K90 价格质疑：内存涨价实在太多
item.guid: 雷军回应-K90-价格质疑：内存涨价实在太多
item.description:
Yesterday, Lu Weibing, partner and president of Xiaomi Group, responded to the pricing controversy of the Redmi K90 series on Weibo. 昨天，小米集团合伙人、总裁卢伟冰在微博回应了 Redmi K90 系列定价争议。

He stated that the pricing difference for the K90 standard version mainly stems from 'cost pressure from upstream, which has genuinely been passed on to the new product's pricing.' Many users expressed disappointment with the pricing of the 12GB + 512GB version. After internal discussion, Xiaomi decided to directly reduce the price of this version by 300 yuan within the first sales month, making the adjusted price 2899 yuan. 他表示，K90 标准版定价差异主要源于「来自上游的成本压力，真实的传导到了新品定价上」。不少用户对 12GB + 512GB 版本的定价表示失望。 经过内部讨论，小米决定该版本在首销月内直降 300 元，调整后售价为 2899 元。

Lu Weibing emphasized that the global storage supply chain price increase has exceeded expectations, and the trend is still intensifying. 'We cannot change the trend of the global supply chain, but we hope this sincerity can make everyone understand.' 卢伟冰强调，全球存储供应链价格上涨超出预期，且趋势仍在加剧，「我们无法改变全球供应链的走势，但希望这份诚意能够让大家理解」。

Xiaomi founder Lei Jun subsequently reposted the relevant Weibo post, pointing out that the price difference issue was mainly attributed to the rise in memory prices. 小米创始人雷军随后转发了相关微博，并指出价差问题主要归因于内存价格上涨。

According to previous reports, the Redmi K90 series was officially released the day before yesterday, with the standard version starting at 2599 yuan and the Pro Max version starting at 3999 yuan. The price difference between different storage versions reached up to 600 yuan, sparking heated discussion among users. 据此前报道，Redmi K90 系列于前天正式发布，标准版起售价为 2599 元，而 Pro Max 版本起售价为 3999 元。不同存储版本之间的价差最高达 600 元，引发用户热议。

Recently, major suppliers such as Samsung Electronics and SK Hynix have raised their quotes, and the average selling price of DRAM is expected to increase by 25% – 26% in the fourth quarter. 近期，三星电子、SK 海力士等主要供应商已上调报价，预计第四季度 DRAM 平均售价将上涨 25% – 26%。

Morgan Stanley predicts that this year, tech giants such as Google, Amazon, Meta, and Microsoft will invest 400 billion US dollars in AI infrastructure, further driving up storage demand and prices. 摩根士丹利预测，今年谷歌、亚马逊、Meta、微软等科技巨头将在人工智能基础设施上投入 4000 亿美元，进一步推高存储需求与价格。

item.title: VOGUE 盛会现场 iPhone 17 Pro 矩阵实现专业级环绕影像
item.guid: VOGUE-盛会现场-iPhone-17-Pro-矩阵实现专业级环绕影像
item.description:
According to CNMO, at yesterday's VOGUE Forces of Fashion event, the video creation team 'Yingshi Jufeng' built a camera array consisting of dozens of iPhone 17 Pro devices, successfully achieving a 'bullet time' shooting effect. 据 CNMO 报道，在昨天举行的 VOGUE Forces of Fashion 时尚盛会上，影像创作团队「影视飓风」搭建了一套由数十台 iPhone 17 Pro 组成的相机矩阵，成功实现了「子弹时间」拍摄效果。

It is understood that the team utilized the Genlock (synchronous phase-locking) feature, which is first introduced on the iPhone 17 Pro. This feature enables all devices to achieve precise synchronization at the frame level, ensuring that the images captured by each camera are perfectly aligned. 据了解，此次团队利用了 iPhone 17 Pro 首次搭载的 Genlock（同步锁相）功能。该功能能够让所有设备在帧级别实现精准同步，确保每一台相机捕捉的画面完全对齐。

This technological breakthrough means that surround effects, which previously required expensive professional camera systems, can now be achieved with mobile devices. 这一技术突破，使得以往需要昂贵专业摄影机系统才能完成的环绕特效，如今可以通过移动设备实现。

At the event, many celebrity guests froze fashion moments in front of the camera, and the dynamic footage captured by this array generated highly impactful short films. 在活动现场，不少明星嘉宾在镜头前定格时尚瞬间，这套矩阵捕捉到的动态画面生成了极具冲击力的短片。

item.title: 微软发布全新 AI 形象「Mico」，Edge 将进化为「AI 浏览器」
item.guid: 微软发布全新-AI-形象「Mico」，Edge-将进化为「AI-浏览器」
item.description:
According to TechCrunch, Microsoft officially launched its new AI persona 'Mico' at this week's Copilot Fall Release event. 据 TechCrunch 报道，微软在本周的 Copilot 秋季发布会上正式推出了全新 AI 形象「Mico」。

This design is seen as a modern return of the classic assistant 'Clippy.' Microsoft stated that Mico is a customizable virtual avatar that can 'listen, respond, and reflect user interactions through color changes.' 这一设计被视为经典助手「Clippy」的现代化回归。微软表示，Mico 是一个可定制的虚拟形象，能够「倾听、回应，并通过颜色变化反映用户的互动」。

Mico is enabled by default in voice mode, and if users tap it several times consecutively, they can trigger an easter egg, transforming it into 'Clippy.' This feature is currently launched first in the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom. Microsoft states that Mico not only saves conversation memories but also continuously learns based on user feedback. Mico 默认在语音模式下启用，用户若连续点击数次，还能触发彩蛋，让其变身为「Clippy」。目前该功能率先在美国、加拿大和英国上线。微软称，Mico 不仅能保存对话记忆，还会根据用户反馈不断学习。

Additionally, Microsoft has introduced 'Learn Live' mode for Copilot, which can act as a real-time tutor in learning scenarios, and a new 'Real Talk' mode, enabling AI to mimic the user's conversational style while maintaining an independent perspective to avoid excessive flattery. 此外，微软还为 Copilot 引入了「Learn Live」模式，可在学习场景中充当实时导师，并新增「Real Talk」模式，使 AI 能够模仿用户的对话风格，同时保持独立视角，避免过度迎合。

In this update, Microsoft also expanded Copilot's capabilities, including support for multi-user shared conversations, long-term memory, connections with productivity applications like email and cloud storage, and deeper AI integration within the Edge browser. 在此次更新中，微软还扩展了 Copilot 的功能，包括支持多人共享对话、长期记忆、与邮件和云存储等生产力应用的连接，以及在 Edge 浏览器中实现更深度的 AI 集成。

Microsoft stated that in the future, Edge will evolve into an 'AI browser,' capable of automatically summarizing, comparing information, and even performing actions like booking tickets or filling out forms on behalf of the user. 微软表示，未来 Edge 将演变为「AI 浏览器」，能够自动总结、比较信息，甚至代替用户完成订票或表单填写等操作。

item.title: 苹果 A20 芯片成本飙升至 280 美元，或仅限高端机型搭载
item.guid: 苹果-A20-芯片成本飙升至-280-美元，或仅限高端机型搭载
item.description:
According to MacRumors, Apple's A20 chip, set to be launched in 2026, will be among the first mass-produced 2-nanometer process processors and is expected to be first applied to the iPhone 18 series. This chip is not only a significant upgrade in performance and energy efficiency but may also become the most expensive single component in the iPhone. 据 MacRumors 报道，苹果即将在 2026 年推出的 A20 芯片将成为首批大规模量产的 2 纳米制程处理器，并有望率先应用于 iPhone 18 系列。该芯片不仅是性能与能效的重大升级，同时也可能成为 iPhone 中最昂贵的单一组件。

The report points out that TSMC has informed customers that the price of 2-nanometer chips will be at least 50% higher than 3-nanometer chips, due to the huge capital investment required for the new process, limited initial yield, and lack of discount strategies. 报道指出，台积电已告知客户，2 纳米芯片的价格将比 3 纳米至少高出 50%，原因在于新制程需要巨额资本投入，且初期良率有限，缺乏折扣策略。

Supply chain estimates that the unit price of a 2-nanometer flagship chip will be approximately $280 (about 1994 RMB), significantly higher than the previous A18 chip's $45. 供应链预估，2 纳米旗舰芯片的单价约为 280 美元（约 1994 元人民币），远高于此前 A18 芯片的 45 美元。

Previous teardown data showed that the A18 chip accounted for about 10% of the total hardware cost and only 5% to 6% of the retail price. 以往拆解数据显示，A18 芯片在整机硬件成本中占比约 10%，零售价占比仅 5% 至 6%。

If the A20's cost significantly increases and Apple does not pass it on to consumers, it will inevitably squeeze profit margins. Therefore, the market generally expects Apple to likely only adopt 2-nanometer chips in the iPhone 18 Pro and iPhone 18 Pro Max, while standard models will continue to use older processes. 若 A20 成本大幅提升而苹果不将其转嫁给消费者，势必压缩利润空间。因此，市场普遍预计苹果可能仅在 iPhone 18 Pro 与 iPhone 18 Pro Max 上采用 2 纳米芯片，而标准版机型则继续使用旧制程。

Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo had previously warned that due to cost pressures, not all iPhone 18 series models would feature 2-nanometer processors. 分析师郭明錤此前也曾警告，由于成本压力，并非所有 iPhone 18 系列机型都会搭载 2 纳米处理器。

item.title: OPPO 回应「绿线门」：4 年内免费换屏，超期优惠更换
item.guid: OPPO-回应「绿线门」：4-年内免费换屏，超期优惠更换
item.description:
According to First Financial Daily, some users recently reported "green line" screen issues with OPPO phones, involving multiple models in the Find X series and Reno series, with most devices being less than 4 years old. 据第一财经报道，近日有用户反映 OPPO 手机在使用过程中出现屏幕「绿线」问题，涉及 Find X 系列、Reno 系列等多款机型，大部分设备使用时间不足 4 年。

In response, OPPO stated that for users who purchased their phones within 4 years, they will provide free screen replacement service; for devices older than 4 years, they can enjoy a discounted screen replacement policy significantly lower than market price. 对此，OPPO 回应称，对于购机 4 年以内的用户，将提供免费更换屏幕服务；而超过 4 年的设备，则可享受远低于市场价的优惠换屏政策。

Meanwhile, according to 36Kr, the "green line gate" incident continues to ferment on social media and complaint platforms. 与此同时，据 36 氪报道，「绿线门」事件在社交媒体和投诉平台上持续发酵。

The Black Cat Complaint Platform shows over 500 related complaint records, and many users on Xiaohongshu have shared similar experiences. Some consumers pointed out that OPPO provides "lifetime screen warranty" for OnePlus users in overseas markets (such as India) but has not implemented it synchronously in China, raising questions of "double standards between China and abroad." 黑猫投诉平台显示，已有超过 500 条相关投诉记录，小红书上也有大量用户分享类似经历。部分消费者指出，OPPO 在海外市场（如印度）为一加用户提供「终身屏幕保修」，但在国内却未能同步执行，引发「中外双标」质疑。

item.title: 小米汽车推跨年购置税补贴方案，最高减免 1.5 万元
item.guid: 小米汽车推跨年购置税补贴方案，最高减免-1.5-万元
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaomi Auto announced the launch of its "New Year Purchase Tax Subsidy Program" to address some car owners' concerns about potential reductions in purchase tax benefits due to cross-year delivery. 昨天，小米汽车宣布推出「跨年购置税补贴方案」，以回应部分车主对跨年交付可能带来购置税优惠减少的担忧。

Xiaomi officially stated that as of yesterday, the order volume for all Xiaomi Auto models has far exceeded expectations. To protect user rights, all users who complete their order lock-in before 24:00 on November 30, 2025, but whose vehicles need to be invoiced and delivered in 2026 due to reasons within the company's responsibility (such as production or transportation), will be eligible for a purchase tax subsidy. 小米官方表示，截至昨天，小米汽车全系车型订单量已远超预期，为保障用户权益，凡在 2025 年 11 月 30 日 24 点前完成锁单，但因生产、运输等企业责任范围内的原因导致车辆需在 2026 年完成开票交付的用户，将可享受购置税补贴。

This subsidy applies to the Xiaomi SU7 series, Xiaomi YU7 series, and Xiaomi SU7 Ultra series models. The subsidy method is a reduction in the final vehicle payment, with a maximum subsidy amount not exceeding 15,000 RMB. 此次补贴适用于小米 SU7 系列、小米 YU7 系列及小米 SU7 Ultra 系列车型。补贴方式为购车尾款减免，最高补贴金额不超过 15,000 元。

item.title: OpenAI 收购 macOS AI 工具 Sky
item.guid: OpenAI-收购-macOS-AI-工具-Sky
item.description:
Recently, OpenAI announced that it has completed the acquisition of Software Applications Incorporated, the developer of Sky, a natural language interface tool for the macOS platform. This acquisition aims to accelerate the integration of AI with desktop operating systems, enhancing user intelligence in scenarios such as writing, planning, and programming. 近日，OpenAI 宣布已完成对 Software Applications Incorporated 的收购，该公司是 macOS 平台自然语言界面工具 Sky 的开发者。此次收购旨在加速 AI 与桌面操作系统的融合，提升用户在写作、规划、编程等场景中的智能体验。

Sky is an AI tool that can understand screen content and invoke local applications, possessing deep macOS integration capabilities. OpenAI stated that Sky's technology will be integrated into the ChatGPT product line, enabling stronger contextual understanding and task execution capabilities in the future. Sky 是一款可理解屏幕内容并调用本地应用的 AI 工具，具备深度 macOS 集成能力。OpenAI 表示，Sky 的技术将被整合进 ChatGPT 产品线，未来将实现更强的上下文理解与任务执行能力。

It is understood that Sky's founders, Ari Weinstein and Conrad Kramer, were previously the developers of the well-known automation application "Workflow." 据了解，Sky 的创始人 Ari Weinstein 和 Conrad Kramer 曾是知名自动化应用「Workflow」的开发者。

Workflow was acquired by Apple in 2017 and subsequently evolved into the Shortcuts feature on iOS and macOS. The two then worked at Apple for several years, with Kramer leaving in 2019 and Weinstein in 2023. After that, they co-founded a new company and developed Sky. Workflow 在 2017 年被苹果收购，随后演变为 iOS 与 macOS 上的快捷指令（Shortcuts） 功能。两人随后在苹果任职数年，Kramer 于 2019 年离开，Weinstein 则在 2023 年离开苹果。此后，他们共同创立了新公司并开发了 Sky。

Nick Turley, VP of OpenAI ChatGPT, stated: "We are building an AI assistant that not only responds to user commands but also proactively completes tasks. Sky's deep macOS integration capabilities accelerate our vision of integrating AI into everyday tools." OpenAI ChatGPT 副总裁 Nick Turley 表示：「我们正在构建一个不仅响应用户指令，更能主动完成任务的 AI 助手。Sky 的 macOS 深度集成能力加速了我们将 AI 融入日常工具的愿景。」

Ari Weinstein, co-founder and CEO of Software Applications Incorporated, said: "We have always wanted computers to be more empowering, customizable, and intuitive. Sky is our AI desktop experience built on large language models, and we are now excited to join OpenAI to bring this vision to users worldwide." Software Applications Incorporated 联合创始人兼 CEO Ari Weinstein 表示：「我们一直希望电脑能更具赋能性、可定制性与直觉性。Sky 是我们基于大语言模型打造的 AI 桌面体验，如今我们很高兴能加入 OpenAI，将这一愿景带给全球用户。」

It is reported that all members of the Sky team will join OpenAI and will continue to promote the implementation of Sky's capabilities in ChatGPT in the future. 据悉，Sky 团队成员将全部加入 OpenAI，未来将继续推动 Sky 能力在 ChatGPT 中的落地。

item.title: 赵长江确认离职：比亚迪「最年轻销售掌门人」或投身智界
item.guid: 赵长江确认离职：比亚迪「最年轻销售掌门人」或投身智界
item.description:
According to DoNews, on October 23, several automotive industry bloggers revealed that Zhao Changjiang, general manager of BYD Denza Fangchengbao Direct Sales Division, has confirmed his resignation. Subsequently, a suspected official resignation announcement from BYD circulated online, stating that Zhao Changjiang resigned due to personal reasons and that relevant procedures have been completed as per regulations. 据 DoNews 报道，10 月 23 日，多位汽车行业博主爆料称，比亚迪腾势方程豹直营事业部总经理赵长江已确认离职。随后，一份疑似比亚迪官方发布的《辞职公告》在网络流传，内容显示赵长江因个人原因辞去职务，相关手续已按规定办理完毕。

Regarding the resignation rumors, Zhao Changjiang himself responded: "It's true. I'll take a break first." Market rumors suggest that his next stop might be the Luxeed brand, a collaboration between Chery and Huawei, where he would serve as head of marketing. 对于离职传闻，赵长江本人回应：「真的。先休息一下。」坊间消息称，他的下一站或将前往奇瑞与华为合作的智界品牌，担任营销负责人。

According to data, Zhao Changjiang joined BYD in 2009, rising from regional sales manager to general manager of BYD Auto Sales Co., Ltd.; from 2021, he served as general manager of the Denza brand division; in July this year, he was appointed general manager of the Denza Fangchengbao Auto Direct Sales Division. 资料显示，赵长江 2009 年加入比亚迪，从区域销售经理一路晋升至比亚迪汽车销售有限公司总经理；2021 年起担任腾势品牌事业部总经理；今年 7 月，出任腾势方程豹汽车直营销售事业部总经理。

As BYD's "youngest sales leader," he was once hailed as "the person who resurrected Denza" thanks to the success of the Denza D9. However, subsequent models like the Denza N7, N9, and Z9 GT failed to maintain the D9's popularity, with sales performance falling short of expectations. 作为「比亚迪最年轻销售掌门人」，他曾凭借腾势 D9 的成功被誉为「让腾势重生的人」。不过，后续推出的腾势 N7、N9 及 Z9 GT 等车型未能延续 D9 的热度，销量表现不及预期。

It is widely believed that this personnel change is related to the slowdown in Denza's growth. In July this year, BYD announced a system rotation, swapping Zhao Changjiang and Li Hui's positions, which was seen as part of an organizational adjustment. 外界普遍认为，此次人事变动与腾势增长放缓有关。今年 7 月，比亚迪曾宣布制度轮岗，让赵长江与李慧对调岗位，被视为组织调整的一部分。

item.title: 滴滴在墨西哥上线 500 辆国产纯电专车，携手埃安加速出海
item.guid: 滴滴在墨西哥上线-500-辆国产纯电专车，携手埃安加速出海
item.description:
Recently, Didi launched 500 pure electric vehicles on its ride-hailing platform in Mexico. This marks Didi's first standardized dedicated car category introduced in Latin America. All the launched pure electric vehicles are from domestic brands, including GAC Aion and JAC Group. 近日，滴滴在墨西哥的出行平台上线了500辆纯电动汽车。这也是滴滴在拉美推出的首个标准化的专车品类。上线的纯电动汽车全部来自国产品牌，包括广汽埃安和江汽集团。

The launch of pure electric dedicated cars is Didi's latest initiative to continuously promote green mobility in Latin America. Last October, Didi announced in Mexico that it would collaborate with automakers, charging infrastructure companies, financial and insurance institutions, and other partners to jointly promote the introduction of 100,000 electric vehicles in Mexico by 2030. Didi's partners include Chinese automakers such as GAC, JAC, Changan, BYD, and local Mexican enterprises. 纯电专车的上线是滴滴在拉美持续推广绿色出行的最新举措。去年10月，滴滴在墨西哥宣布联合车企、充电设施企业、金融和保险机构等合作伙伴，共同推动到2030年在墨西哥引入10万辆电动车。滴滴的合作伙伴包括广汽、江汽、长安、比亚迪等中国车企和墨西哥本土企业。

item.title: 日产新技术亮相让电动车「晒太阳就能跑」
item.guid: 日产新技术亮相让电动车「晒太阳就能跑」
item.description:
According to Carscoops, Nissan will showcase a new solar extender device called "Ao-Solar Extender" at the Japan Mobility Show. 据 Carscoops 报道，日产将在日本移动出行展上展示一款名为「Ao-Solar Extender」的全新太阳能扩展装置。

The device can be installed on the roof of the Nissan Sakura electric vehicle, comprising a 300W fixed solar panel and an additional 200W panel that can be deployed when parked. 该设备可安装在日产 Sakura 电动车车顶，包含一块 300W 固定太阳能板，以及一块可在停车时展开的 200W 额外面板。

Official data shows that the system can provide approximately 1,864 miles (about 3,000 kilometers) of additional range per year, potentially allowing some users to almost entirely avoid relying on external charging. Nissan points out that many Sakura owners have short daily commutes, so this device can "virtually eliminate the need for external charging." 官方数据显示，该系统每年可为车辆提供约 1864 英里（约 3000 公里）的额外续航，甚至能让部分用户几乎无需依赖外部充电。日产指出，许多 Sakura 车主的日常出行距离较短，因此这一装置能够「几乎消除外部充电需求」。

Additionally, when deployed, the Ao-Solar Extender can also act as a sunshade, helping to lower the interior temperature and reduce air conditioning energy consumption. Nissan also emphasizes that the device can be used as a backup power source in emergencies, further enhancing its practicality. 此外，Ao-Solar Extender 在展开时还能充当遮阳板，帮助降低车内温度，减少空调能耗。日产还强调，该装置在紧急情况下可作为备用电源使用，进一步提升实用性。

The Japan Mobility Show will be held from October 30 to November 9, 2025, at the Tokyo Big Sight International Exhibition Center. It is a biennial global mobility event, formerly known as the Tokyo Motor Show, bringing together numerous automakers and technology companies to showcase future mobility solutions. 日本移动出行展将于 2025 年 10 月 30 日至 11 月 9 日在东京有明国际会展中心举行，是两年一度的全球性出行盛会，前身为东京车展，汇聚了众多车企和科技公司展示未来出行方案。

item.title: 通用将逐步取消 CarPlay 与 Android Auto 支持
item.guid: 通用将逐步取消-CarPlay-与-Android-Auto-支持
item.description:
According to CarBuzz, General Motors (GM) CEO Mary Barra confirmed in an interview that the company plans to gradually discontinue support for Apple CarPlay and Android Auto in gasoline-powered vehicles in the future. This decision had previously been implemented in electric models and will now be extended to internal combustion engine models. 据 CarBuzz 报道，通用汽车（GM）首席执行官玛丽・巴拉在接受采访时确认，公司计划在未来逐步取消燃油车对 Apple CarPlay 和 Android Auto 的支持。这一决定此前已在电动车型上实施，如今将扩展至内燃机车型。

Barra stated: "As we move forward with new models and significant updates, smartphone mirroring functionality will no longer be offered. We prioritized this transition in electric vehicles and will now maintain consistency across the entire product portfolio." 巴拉表示：「随着我们推进新车型和重大更新，智能手机投屏功能将不再提供。我们优先在电动车上完成这一转变，接下来会在整个产品组合中保持一致。」

GM added that existing gasoline-powered vehicles supporting Apple CarPlay and Android Auto will not be affected, and users can continue to use them. However, as the company advances its centralized computing platform, it will gradually transition to a more deeply integrated native application experience in the future. 通用方面补充称，现有支持 Apple CarPlay 和 Android Auto 的燃油车不会受到影响，用户仍可继续使用。但随着公司推进集中式计算平台，未来将逐步过渡到更深度整合的原生应用体验。

item.title: 新一代 Exynos SoC 曝光：5G 基带内置 AI 核心，可实时预测卫星位置
item.guid: 新一代-Exynos-SoC-曝光：5G-基带内置-AI-核心，可实时预测卫星位置
item.description:
According to wccftech, Samsung is developing a new Exynos SoC, the biggest highlight of which is the integration of an NPU (Neural Processing Unit) into its 5G baseband modem. 据 wccftech 报道，三星正在研发一款全新的 Exynos SoC，其最大亮点是将在 5G 基带调制解调器中集成 NPU（神经处理单元）。

This design will endow the baseband chip with AI capabilities, used for real-time prediction of low-Earth orbit satellite positions and optimization of signal strength, thereby improving satellite communication efficiency. 这一设计将赋予基带芯片 AI 能力，用于实时预测低轨卫星位置、优化信号强度，从而提升卫星通信效率。

The report states that Samsung Semiconductor executives recently met with SpaceX to discuss the development progress of the new Exynos SoC. Analysts speculate that Samsung may hope to enter SpaceX's low-Earth orbit satellite supply chain through this. 报道称，三星半导体部门高管近期与 SpaceX 举行会面，讨论了新 Exynos SoC 的开发进展。有分析人士推测，三星可能希望借此进入 SpaceX 的低轨卫星供应链。

It is currently unclear whether this feature will appear on the rumored Exynos 2600 chip. Previous reports suggested that the Exynos 2600 might use an external 5G baseband design. However, existing information does not mention NPU integration, meaning that related features might only be implemented in subsequent versions. 目前尚不清楚该功能是否会出现在传闻中的 Exynos 2600 芯片上。此前消息称，Exynos 2600 可能采用外挂 5G 基带设计。而现有信息并未提及 NPU 集成，意味着相关功能可能要等到后续版本才会实现。

item.title: Sora App 更新预告：宠物可「客串」AI 视频，安卓版也将上线
item.guid: Sora-App-更新预告：宠物可「客串」AI-视频，安卓版也将上线
item.description:
According to TechCrunch, OpenAI's AI video generation app Sora is about to receive a major update, adding a "cameo" feature for pet characters, basic video editing tools, and social experience optimization, while the Android version will also be launched soon. 据 TechCrunch 报道，OpenAI 旗下 AI 视频生成应用 Sora 即将迎来重大更新，新增宠物角色「客串」功能、基础视频剪辑工具以及社交体验优化，同时安卓版本也即将上线。

Since its launch at the end of September, Sora has quickly topped the App Store download charts in the US and Canada, with cumulative downloads exceeding 2 million by the time of publication. Sora 自 9 月底上线以来迅速登顶美加地区 App Store 下载榜，截至发稿时累计下载量已突破 200 万次。

It is reported that this update will allow users to transform pets, toys, and other items into "cameo" characters in AI videos, which can be shared with friends to enable multi-person creation. 据悉，此次更新将允许用户将宠物、玩具等物品转化为 AI 视频中的角色「客串」，并可与好友共享，实现多人创作。

Bill Peebles, head of Sora, stated: "We expect users to register a large number of novel cameo characters, so we have updated the generation interface to support real-time display of popular cameos." Sora 负责人 Bill Peebles 表示：「我们预计用户将注册大量新奇的客串角色，为此我们更新了生成界面，支持实时展示热门客串。」

In addition, Sora will launch basic video editing features, initially supporting multi-segment video splicing, with editing tools gradually expanding later. In terms of social features, the official plan is to introduce exclusive channels for groups such as universities, companies, and sports clubs to enhance the interactive experience. 此外，Sora 将上线基础视频剪辑功能，首批支持多段视频拼接，后续将逐步扩展编辑工具。社交方面，官方计划推出面向高校、公司、运动俱乐部等群体的专属频道，提升互动体验。

Notably, the Sora Android version has opened for pre-registration on the Google Play Store, and Peebles stated it "will be available soon" but did not disclose a specific date. 值得注意的是，Sora Android 版本已在 Google Play 商店开放预注册，Peebles 表示「很快就会上线」，但未透露具体时间。

item.title: 豆包携手 7 家博物馆上线「AI 讲解员」功能
item.guid: 豆包携手-7-家博物馆上线「AI-讲解员」功能
item.description:
Yesterday, Doubao announced on its official public account that it has partnered with seven museums, including the National Museum of China, China Numismatic Museum, Henan Museum, Shandong Museum, Anhui Museum, Chengdu Museum, and Luoyang Museum, to jointly create a "Digital Exhibition Experience Zone," offering the public a brand new way to visit exhibitions. 昨天，豆包在官方公众号发文宣布与中国国家博物馆、中国钱币博物馆、河南博物院、山东博物馆、安徽博物院、成都博物馆、洛阳博物馆等 7 家博物馆达成合作，共同打造「数字化看展体验区」，为公众提供全新的逛展方式。

When visiting, users simply need to open the "video call" function of the Doubao App, or upload photos of cultural relics, and the system can identify them based on its VLM visual understanding capabilities and quickly generate professional explanations. 用户在参观时，只需打开豆包 App 的「视频通话」功能，或拍照上传文物画面，系统即可基于 VLM 视觉理解能力进行识别，并快速生成专业讲解。

In this collaboration, Doubao focused on optimizing three aspects of its capabilities: 此次合作中，豆包重点优化了三方面能力：

    "Accuracy of cultural relic identification and explanation" has been significantly improved through targeted search optimization, large model knowledge activation, and museum data support.

    "Continuous interactive discussion" supports users to ask follow-up questions about details at any time, and can even trigger an "active interpretation" mode.

    "Explanation style" balances professionalism and accessibility, catering to different groups such as teenagers and enthusiasts, becoming the user's "exclusive private guide."

Doubao stated that this feature will allow visitors to have an immersive digital exhibition experience both inside and outside the museum. 豆包方面表示，该功能将让观众在博物馆内外都能获得沉浸式的数字化看展体验。

item.title: 星链在印度启动安全测试，最快 2026 年初商用
item.guid: 星链在印度启动安全测试，最快-2026-年初商用
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Elon Musk's Starlink has initiated safety tests in India, one of the crucial steps before offering commercial satellite broadband services in the region. 据彭博社报道，埃隆 · 马斯克旗下的星链已在印度启动安全测试，这是其在当地提供商业卫星宽带服务前的关键步骤之一。

Sources say that if the Indian telecom regulator releases the final pricing framework for satellite services by the end of the year, Starlink could provide internet access to home users as early as the beginning of 2026. 消息人士称，若印度电信监管局在年底前发布卫星服务的最终定价框架，星链最快可在 2026 年初向家庭用户提供网络接入。

Starlink plans to directly target retail consumers, focusing on covering rural areas and regions with insufficient high-speed internet. 星链计划直接面向零售消费者，重点覆盖农村和高速网络不足的地区。

Currently, the company is building at least 10 satellite gateways in India, more than three times the number of its competitors Reliance Jio's Space Fiber and Eutelsat OneWeb. Three ground stations have been built in Mumbai, which will serve as India's business hub. 目前，该公司正在印度建设至少 10 个卫星网关，数量超过竞争对手 Reliance Jio 的 Space Fiber 和 Eutelsat OneWeb 的三倍。孟买已建成 3 个地面站，将作为印度业务枢纽。

The Indian government is promoting private enterprises to enter the aerospace and satellite communication sectors to compensate for the insufficient coverage of fiber optic and mobile networks. 印度政府正推动私营企业进入航天与卫星通信领域，以弥补光纤和移动网络的覆盖不足。

item.title: Anthropic 首尔办公室落地在即，Claude 使用量在韩激增 6 倍
item.guid: Anthropic-首尔办公室落地在即，Claude-使用量在韩激增-6-倍
item.description:
Anthropic announced yesterday in a press release on its official website that it will establish an office in Seoul in early 2026, making it Anthropic's third office in the Asia-Pacific region, following Tokyo and Bangalore. Anthropic 昨日在官网发布新闻稿，宣布将在 2026 年初于首尔设立办公室，这是继东京和班加罗尔之后，Anthropic 在亚太地区的第三个办公室。

The official statement indicated that over the past year, the company's revenue in the Asia-Pacific region grew by more than 10 times, and the number of large clients increased by 8 times, with the Korean market becoming one of the most active regions for Claude users. 官方表示，过去一年公司在亚太地区的收入增长超过 10 倍，大客户数量增长 8 倍，韩国市场已成为 Claude 用户最活跃的地区之一。

Data shows that South Korean users rank among the top five globally in both overall Claude usage and per capita usage. Active users of Claude Code in South Korea have grown 6 times in the past 4 months, and the individual with the highest global usage is also in South Korea, an engineer. 数据显示，韩国用户在 Claude 总体使用量和人均使用量上均位列全球前五，Claude Code 在韩国的活跃用户在过去 4 个月增长了 6 倍，全球使用量最高的个人也在韩国，为一名工程师。

Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei stated: "South Korea is at the forefront of AI innovation in Asia, and Claude's cutting-edge capabilities and safety assurances will be fully demonstrated within South Korea's technology ecosystem and forward-thinking institutions." Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei 表示：「韩国在亚洲的 AI 创新中处于前沿，Claude 的前沿能力与安全保障将在韩国的技术生态和前瞻性机构中得到充分展现。」

Currently, South Korean companies have been pioneers in applying Claude across various sectors. For instance, Law&Company leveraged Claude to create an AI legal assistant, almost doubling lawyer efficiency; SK Telecom, on the other hand, developed a customized customer service AI based on Claude, setting a benchmark in the telecommunications industry. 目前，韩国企业已在多个领域率先应用 Claude。例如，Law&Company 借助 Claude 打造 AI 法律助手，几乎将律师效率翻倍；SK Telecom 则基于 Claude 开发定制客服 AI，成为电信行业的标杆。

Anthropic emphasized that it will establish a local team in South Korea in the future to support the enterprise and developer ecosystem, and collaborate with government, research institutions, and industry partners to promote responsible AI development. Anthropic 强调，未来将在韩国建立本地团队，支持企业与开发者生态，并与政府、研究机构和产业伙伴合作，推动负责任的 AI 发展。

item.title: 英特尔 Q3 扭亏为盈，「Tick-Tock」迭代模式终结
item.guid: 英特尔-Q3-扭亏为盈，「Tick-Tock」迭代模式终结
item.description:
According to The Verge, Intel announced during its Q3 2025 earnings call that the company achieved profitability for the first time in nearly two years, primarily due to financial support from Nvidia, SoftBank, and the U.S. government. 据 The Verge 报道，英特尔在 2025 年第三季度财报电话会议上宣布，公司在近两年内首次实现盈利，主要得益于来自英伟达、软银以及美国政府的资金支持。

Despite this, Intel still faces tight chip supply issues, with shortages expected to peak in early 2026. 尽管如此，英特尔仍面临芯片供应紧张的问题，预计短缺将在 2026 年初达到高峰。

Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger stated that the company will prioritize ensuring production capacity for AI server chips over entry-level consumer processors. Concurrently, Intel plans to emulate Nvidia and AMD by launching new generations of AI GPUs annually to meet rapidly growing market demand. 英特尔 CEO 陈立武表示，公司将优先保障 AI 服务器芯片的产能，而非入门级消费级处理器。同时，英特尔计划效仿英伟达和 AMD，每年推出新一代 AI GPU，以满足快速增长的市场需求。

Regarding consumer products, only one SKU of the 18A process-based Panther Lake chip will be launched this year, with gradual expansion in 2026, but the initial price will be "quite expensive." Therefore, Intel will continue to rely on Lunar Lake chips in the first half of 2026 to fill market gaps. 在消费级产品方面，基于 18A 工艺的 Panther Lake 芯片今年仅会推出一个 SKU，2026 年逐步扩展，但初期价格「相当昂贵」。因此，英特尔将在 2026 年上半年继续依赖 Lunar Lake 芯片来填补市场空缺。

The financial report also showed that while the yield of the 18A process can meet supply, the profit margin is insufficient, and it is expected to reach ideal levels only by 2026 to 2027. 财报还显示，18A 工艺的良率虽能满足供应，但利润率不足，预计要到 2026 至 2027 年才能达到理想水平。

Intel emphasized that 18A will serve as a "long-lived node," supporting at least three generations of client and server products. Concurrently, the 14A process, which might have been canceled, was retained due to customer support and outperforms the 18A in terms of performance and yield during the same period. 英特尔强调，18A 将作为「长寿节点」，支撑至少三代客户端和服务器产品。同时，原本可能被取消的 14A 工艺因客户支持而得以保留，并在性能和良率上优于同期的 18A。

It is worth noting that Intel explicitly stated in this earnings report that it will not return to the classic "Tick-Tock" chip iteration model . 值得注意的是， 英特尔在此次财报中明确表示，不会回归经典的「Tick-Tock」芯片迭代模式 。

This model was Intel's long-standing development strategy: shrinking the manufacturing process during the "Tick" phase and introducing a new microarchitecture during the "Tock" phase, alternating between the two, maintaining regular iterations like a pendulum. However, as the difficulty of advancing sophisticated processes increased, this model became unsustainable. 该模式曾是英特尔长期坚持的开发策略：在「Tick」阶段缩小制程工艺，在「Tock」阶段推出全新微架构，两者交替进行，像钟摆一样保持规律迭代。但随着先进工艺推进难度加大，这一模式已难以为继。

Pat Gelsinger emphasized that in the future, market demands will be addressed by extending process node lifespans and adopting flexible product roadmaps. 陈立武强调，未来将通过延长工艺节点寿命与灵活的产品路线来应对市场需求。

item.title: 💡 诺基亚 CEO：人工智能长期前景「极为广阔」，AI 投资不会放缓
item.guid: 💡-诺基亚-CEO：人工智能长期前景「极为广阔」，AI-投资不会放缓
item.description:
According to Business Insider, Nokia President and CEO Justin Hotard recently stated in an interview that AI investment will not slow down because the sector is in a "supercycle" with "extremely broad" long-term prospects. 据 Business Insider 报道，诺基亚总裁兼首席执行官 Justin Hotard 近日在接受采访时表示，人工智能投资不会放缓，因为该领域正处于「超级周期」，长期前景「极为广阔」。

Hotard officially took over as Nokia CEO in April this year. In an interview with CNBC, he pointed out that the current application of AI is still in its early stages, especially in areas such as autonomous driving, augmented and virtual reality, smart glasses, and robotics, where penetration remains very low. Hotard 于今年 4 月正式接任诺基亚 CEO 一职，他在接受 CNBC 采访时指出，当前人工智能的应用仍处于早期阶段，尤其是在自动驾驶、增强与虚拟现实、智能眼镜以及机器人等领域，渗透率依然很低。

He emphasized that AI not only drives demand for large-scale network infrastructure but will also bring long-term structural growth. 他强调，人工智能不仅推动了大规模的网络建设需求，还将带来长期的结构性增长。

I believe this is a growth trend that will continue for many years; there might be short-term fluctuations, but the long-term outlook is enormous.

Regarding external concerns about a potential AI investment bubble, Hotard believes this view is too short-sighted. He cited the internet, which also experienced a bubble in its early days but later saw growth far exceeding the bubble period. 对于外界担忧 AI 投资可能存在泡沫，Hotard 认为这种看法过于短视。他举例称，互联网在早期也经历过泡沫，但随后迎来了远超泡沫时期的增长。

Meanwhile, tech giants are still increasing their investments. For example, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg once stated that the company plans to invest at least $600 billion in U.S. data centers and infrastructure by 2028. Although he acknowledged the potential risk of an AI bubble, he would rather "overinvest" than "underinvest." 与此同时，科技巨头们仍在加大投入。例如，Meta CEO 扎克伯格曾表示，公司计划到 2028 年在美国数据中心和基础设施方面投入至少 6000 亿美元。尽管他承认 AI 可能存在泡沫风险，但宁愿「过度投资」也不愿「投资不足」。

item.title: Nike 推出「脚上的电动助力系统」
item.guid: Nike-推出「脚上的电动助力系统」
item.description:
According to The Verge, Nike announced the launch of its first "powered shoe" system, Project Amplify, whose design concept is similar to an "electric bicycle for your feet." 据 The Verge 报道，Nike 宣布推出首款「动力鞋」系统 Project Amplify，其设计理念类似「脚上的电动自行车」。

The product was jointly developed by Nike and robotics company Dephy, featuring a lightweight mechanical structure that provides extra power to the wearer through motors, drive belts, and rechargeable batteries, helping to improve walking and running speed. 该产品由 Nike 与机器人公司 Dephy 合作研发，采用轻量化机械结构，通过电机、传动带和可充电电池为穿戴者提供额外动力，帮助提升步行和跑步速度。

Nike stated that this product is not designed for professional athletes but for everyday users, aiming to enable people to move faster and farther with less effort, essentially adding a set of 'external muscles' to the calves. Nike 表示，这款产品并非为专业运动员打造，而是面向日常用户，目标是让人们以更少的体力完成更快、更远的移动，相当于为小腿增加了一组「外置肌肉」。

Currently, Project Amplify has been tested with over 400 athletes in recent years and is expected to be launched to consumers in the coming years. 目前，Project Amplify 已在过去数年间与超过 400 名运动员进行测试，预计将在未来几年面向消费者推出。

In addition to powered shoes, Nike also showcased neuroscience-based footwear design and new heat dissipation technology, aiming to further enhance the comfort and performance of sports equipment. 除了动力鞋，Nike 还展示了基于神经科学的鞋类设计和全新散热技术，旨在进一步提升运动装备的舒适性与性能。

item.title: 喜茶启动「灵感采摘者」公益行动，聚焦云南女性农人
item.guid: 喜茶启动「灵感采摘者」公益行动，聚焦云南女性农人
item.description:
Yesterday, Heytea released a special content feature titled 'In Yunnan, The Grape Pickers' on its official WeChat public account, focusing on the grape pickers and inspiration behind its 'Fleshy Grape Family'. 昨天，喜茶在官方微信公众号发布了主题为「在云南，摘葡萄的人」的内容特辑，聚焦其「多肉葡萄家族」背后的采摘者群体与灵感来源。

The article points out that the core ingredient of 'Fleshy Grape,' the Summer Black grape, primarily comes from Jianshui, Yunnan. The harvesting is carried out by a group of 'new farmers,' over 70% of whom are women. In recent years, the brand has continuously promoted the order agriculture cooperation model, establishing a 3,300-mu grape base in Jianshui, Yunnan, and promoting the green upgrade of tea gardens in Pu'er. 文中指出，「多肉葡萄」的核心原料夏黑葡萄主要产自云南建水，采摘工作则由一群女性占比超过七成的「新农人」完成，近年来品牌持续推进订单农业合作模式，在云南建水布局 3300 亩葡萄基地，并在普洱推动茶园绿色化升级。

Heytea, in collaboration with the China Foundation for Rural Development, conducted in-depth visits to production areas, researched the working environment and development needs of female farmers, and formulated the first phase of its public welfare action plan. Heytea stated that in the future, it will continue to work with the China Foundation for Rural Development to carry out more public welfare actions focusing on labor protection, skills training, disease relief, and children's aesthetic education, and to use its brand influence to draw more attention to the female power in the upstream of the new tea beverage industry. 喜茶联合中国乡村发展基金会，深入走访产地，调研女性农人劳动环境与产业发展需求，制定出首期公益行动方案。喜茶表示，未来将继续携手中国乡村发展基金会，围绕劳动保障、技能培训、疾病救助、子女美育等方面展开更多公益行动，并通过品牌影响力让更多人关注新茶饮产业上游的女性力量。

item.title: 上海万豪 8888 元婚宴被质疑预制菜，罗永浩关注
item.guid: 上海万豪-8888-元婚宴被质疑预制菜，罗永浩关注
item.description:
According to a report by Shangguan News, a blogger recently posted a video on social media claiming that the wedding banquet held at the Shanghai Central Urban Marriott Hotel was criticized by guests for poor food quality, suspecting that the hotel used pre-made dishes. 据上观新闻报道，近日，一位博主在社交平台发布视频称，其在上海中优城市万豪酒店举办的婚礼晚宴遭宾客吐槽餐食不佳，怀疑酒店使用了预制菜。

The blogger stated that the hotel insisted during negotiations that '100% no pre-made dishes were used,' but upon entering the kitchen, found a large quantity of packaged or pre-processed ingredients in the cabinets, including German salted pork hock, eight-treasure rice, and dim sum from the wedding banquet menu. 该博主表示，酒店方面在交涉中坚称「100% 没有一个预制菜」，但其进入后厨后发现橱柜内存放有大量包装好或处理好的食材，其中包括婚宴菜单上的德国咸猪手、八宝饭、点心等。

The blogger revealed that the total cost of the wedding banquet was approximately 379,800 yuan, with a meal standard of 8,888 yuan per table, but the dishes were questioned by guests for not meeting expectations. The video's exposure garnered widespread attention, even attracting Luo Yonghao to repost it and ask, 'Where is the original post?' 该博主透露，这场婚礼晚宴总花费约 37.98 万元，每桌餐标为 8888 元，但菜品却被宾客质疑品质不符预期。视频曝光后引发广泛关注，甚至吸引了罗永浩转发并询问「原帖在哪里」。

Meanwhile, the Shanghai Central Urban Marriott Hotel sent a lawyer's letter to the blogger, citing 'publishing false statements,' demanding the deletion of relevant content and a public apology. Reporters subsequently contacted the hotel, where customer service staff stated they could not respond for now, and banquet hall staff said the hotel had launched an investigation. 与此同时，上海中优城市万豪酒店以「发布不实言论」为由，向博主发出律师函，要求其删除相关内容并公开赔礼道歉。记者随后联系酒店方面，客服人员表示暂时无法回应，而宴会厅工作人员则称酒店已展开调查。

According to previous reports, in September this year, Luo Yonghao had a heated debate with Xibei Catering Group over the issue of 'pre-made dishes.' 据此前报道，今年 9 月，罗永浩曾因「预制菜」问题与西贝餐饮集团发生激烈争论。

He questioned Xibei Restaurant on social media, stating it was 'almost all pre-made dishes, and so expensive,' and called for legislation to mandate catering businesses to label whether they use pre-made dishes. In response, Xibei founder Jia Guolong claimed '100% no pre-made dishes' and threatened to sue Luo Yonghao. 他在社交平台上质疑西贝餐厅「几乎全是预制菜，还那么贵」，并呼吁立法要求餐饮企业强制标注是否使用预制菜。对此，西贝创始人贾国龙回应称「100% 没有预制菜」，并扬言起诉罗永浩。

Subsequently, Luo Yonghao live-streamed, showcasing evidence of semi-finished products provided by netizens, and offered a reward for more clues. The incident sparked widespread public discussion, and ultimately, Xibei issued an apology letter, promising to gradually reduce central kitchen processing steps. 随后，罗永浩开直播展示网友提供的半成品证据，并悬赏征集更多线索。事件一度引发全民热议，最终西贝方面发布致歉信，承诺逐步减少中央厨房加工环节。

item.title: 《带你回家》今日登陆院线
item.guid: 《带你回家》今日登陆院线
item.description:
The realistic family drama film 'Bring You Home' officially premiered in cinemas nationwide today. Yesterday, the filmmakers released a 'Autumn Rendezvous' countdown poster, connecting the mother-daughter emotional trajectory with film-like visuals, extending a warm invitation to the audience. 现实主义亲情电影《带你回家》今天正式登陆全国院线。昨日，片方发布「共赴秋约」版倒计时海报，以胶片画面串联母女情感轨迹，向观众发出温暖邀约。

The film, directed by He Boya and starring Wang Zhen'er and Li Ping, tells the story of a mother and daughter's emotional reconstruction process, from estrangement to reconciliation, against the backdrop of Alzheimer's disease. 影片由贺伯亚执导，王真儿、李萍主演，讲述在阿尔茨海默症背景下，母女二人从隔阂到和解的情感重建过程。

According to previous reports, during the premiere and the 'Take Mom to the Movies' series of events, the film received praise such as 'sincere' and 'surprising,' and was hailed as 'the most worthwhile film to watch with family this year.' 据此前报道，在首映及「请妈妈看电影」系列活动中，影片收获「真诚」「惊喜」等评价，被赞为「年度最值得与家人共看的电影」。

In the newly released countdown poster, Zhang Yuanyuan, played by Wang Zhen'er, looks back gently, with film-like images capturing the complex emotions of family love and intergenerational heritage. The filmmakers used 'Love is the only way home' as the theme, injecting a healing warmth into autumn. 最新发布的倒计时海报中，王真儿饰演的张缘缘温柔回望，胶片影像定格了亲情的复杂心绪与代际传承。片方以「爱是唯一归途」作为点题，为秋日注入治愈暖流。

item.title: 韩延朱一龙新片《空枪》官宣
item.guid: 韩延朱一龙新片《空枪》官宣
item.description:
Yesterday, the film 'Empty Gun,' directed by Han Yan and starring Zhu Yilong, was officially announced and its concept poster released. Set in a city of desires at the turn of the century, the story revolves around a high-stakes gamble concerning fate: some not only want to win everything but also attempt to rewrite the rules. 昨天，由韩延执导、朱一龙领衔主演的电影《空枪》正式官宣并发布概念海报。影片背景设定在世纪之交的欲望之城，故事围绕一场关乎命运的博弈展开：有人不仅想赢走一切，更妄图改写规则。

In the concept poster released this time, dark clouds loom over the city, and a lone figure stands in the storm. He gazes down at the gun in his hand, his expression showing both hesitation and determination, foreshadowing an unavoidable choice. 在此次发布的概念海报中，暗云压城，一道孤独身影立于风暴之中，他低头凝视手中的枪，神情既有犹豫又显决绝，预示着一场无法回避的抉择。

The film is co-produced by Zhujiang Film Group, Guangdong Zhuying Film Production, Guangdong Lianrui Muma Pictures, and Zhejiang Hengdian Film. This also marks the second collaboration between director Han Yan and actor Zhu Yilong after "Lighting Up The Stars". 影片由珠江电影集团、广东珠影影视制作、广东联瑞木马影业、浙江横店影业联合出品。这也是导演韩延与演员朱一龙继《人生大事》后的再度合作。

item.title: One Fun Thing｜成都街头惊现鸵鸟狂奔：从餐馆「越狱」逃出，已被抓回
item.guid: One-Fun-Thing｜成都街头惊现鸵鸟狂奔：从餐馆「越狱」逃出，已被抓回
item.description:
According to Cover News, on October 19, two ostriches were seen running wildly on the streets near the University Town in Wenjiang District, Chengdu, attracting a large number of citizens to watch and film. Witnesses said the two ostriches "were estimated to be traveling at 40 yards per hour, faster than cars," and at one point weaved through traffic and crowds, creating a rather thrilling scene. 据封面新闻报道，10 月 19 日，成都市温江区大学城附近街头出现了两只鸵鸟狂奔的场景，引发大量市民围观和拍摄。目击者称，这两只鸵鸟「目测时速 40 码，比汽车都快」，一度在车流与人群中穿梭，场面颇为惊险。

It is understood that the two ostriches came from a restaurant named "Ostrich Health Soup Pot" on Heping Road, Liucheng Street, Wenjiang District. The restaurant had not yet officially opened. On that day, the ostriches were originally kept in an iron cage at the entrance for promotional display, but due to worker negligence, the ostriches kicked open the cage and escaped, then ran onto the road. 据了解，这两只鸵鸟来自温江区柳城街道和平路一家名为「鸵鸟养生汤锅」的餐馆。该餐馆尚未正式营业，当日原本将鸵鸟关在店门口铁笼中用于宣传展示，但因工人疏忽，鸵鸟踢开铁笼后逃出，随即跑上马路。

Nearby businesses stated that after the ostriches "escaped," they ran rampant on the streets, even jumping over guardrails and crossing traffic, causing passersby to exclaim. Subsequently, police and professionals intervened, successfully controlling the ostriches and returning them to the restaurant. According to several staff members, these ostriches were originally transported from a breeding farm in Dujiangyan and were slaughtered after the incident. 附近商户表示，鸵鸟「越狱」后在街头横冲直撞，甚至翻越护栏、穿越车流，引发路人惊呼。随后，警方与专业人员介入，将鸵鸟成功控制并带回餐馆。 据多名店员透露，这些鸵鸟原本从都江堰养殖场运来，事发后已被宰杀处理。

item.title: 周末看什么｜《伊甸园：最后的秘境》
item.guid: 周末看什么｜《伊甸园：最后的秘境》
item.description:
“Eden: Untamed Planet” is a nature documentary produced by a British team, directed by Ingrid Kvale, with narration by Helena Bonham Carter. The film premiered in 2021, consisting of 6 episodes, each approximately 50 minutes long. 《伊甸园：最后的秘境》是一部由英国团队制作的自然纪录片，导演为 Ingrid Kvale，旁白由海伦娜·伯翰·卡特担任。该片于 2021 年首播，共 6 集，每集时长约 50 分钟。

The production team spent two years delving into 6 ecological sanctuaries around the world that have not been extensively developed by humans, including tropical rainforests, deserts, plateaus, and river valleys. Through advanced imaging technology, the film showcases the survival status of endangered animals such as proboscis monkeys, orangutans, and Malayan sun bears, as well as the evolutionary wisdom of unique plants like pitcher plants. 制作团队历时两年，深入全球 6 处未被人类大规模开发的生态秘境，包括热带雨林、沙漠、高原与河谷。影片通过先进的影像技术，展现了长鼻猴、红毛猩猩、马来熊等濒危动物的生存状态，以及猪笼草等独特植物的进化智慧。

The documentary not only captures rare natural scenes but also reveals the impact of human activities on the ecological environment. For example, palm oil cultivation has led to the disappearance of 80% of orangutan habitats, highlighting the urgency of protecting pristine ecosystems. 纪录片不仅捕捉到罕见的自然画面，还揭示了人类活动对生态环境的冲击。例如，棕榈树种植导致 80% 红毛猩猩栖息地消失，凸显了保护原始生态系统的紧迫性。

With a high rating of 9.2 on Douban, this work is hailed as a "top-tier visual spectacle," serving as both a feast for the eyes and a profound reflection on the relationship between humans and nature. 凭借豆瓣 9.2 的高分口碑，这部作品被誉为「顶级洗眼神片」，既是视觉盛宴，也是对人类与自然关系的深刻反思。

item.title: 买书不读指南｜《如何成为一只猫》
item.guid: 买书不读指南｜《如何成为一只猫》
item.description:
In "How to Be a Cat," Sun Dong uses the cat as a central image, constructing a space that integrates philosophy, social observation, and psychological implications across more than fifty essays and fifty oil paintings of cats. 在《如何成为一只猫》中，孙冬以猫为核心意象，在五十余篇文字与五十余幅猫咪油画之间，构建出一个融合哲学、社会观察与心理意涵的空间。

In the book, cats are no longer just pets but cultural metaphors, reflections of human society, cities, and even gender relations. By observing cats' laziness, independence, and disregard for authority, the author raises a series of reflections: Why are we unwilling to relax? Afraid to be willful? Unable to refuse obedience? 在书中，猫不再只是宠物，而是文化隐喻，是人类社会、城市乃至性别关系的映射体。作者通过凝视猫的慵懒、独立与无视权威，提出一系列反思：我们为何不愿放松？不敢任性？不能拒绝服从？

The illustrator, Zhu Rui, depicts cats in a "non-experiential" way. She never owns cats, yet allows them to appear naturally on the canvas, presenting unpredictable forms. This "unfounded imagination" becomes another way to understand feline and human nature. 绘者朱蕊则以「非经验」的方式描绘猫。她从不养猫，却让猫自然出现在画布上，呈现出不可预测的形态。这种「无根据的想象」成为理解猫性与人性的另一种途径。

item.title: 游戏推荐｜《逃离鸭科夫》上线一周销量破百万，游戏行业高景气度或将持续
item.guid: 游戏推荐｜《逃离鸭科夫》上线一周销量破百万，游戏行业高景气度或将持续
item.description:
According to Cailian Press, the duck-themed PVE top-down extraction shooter game "Escape from Duckov" has performed remarkably since its launch on October 16, with sales exceeding 1 million copies in just one week, becoming a hot topic in the recent gaming market. 据财联社报道，鸭子题材 PVE 俯视角撤离射击游戏《逃离鸭科夫》自 10 月 16 日上线以来表现亮眼，仅用一周时间销量便突破 100 万份，成为近期游戏市场的热门话题。

Developed by Carbonated Squad and published by Bilibili, the game quickly attracted player attention with its lighthearted parody setting and affordable pricing. 该作由碳酸小队开发、哔哩哔哩发行，凭借轻松恶搞的设定和亲民定价迅速吸引玩家关注。

"Escape from Duckov" has currently received over 10,000 comments from simplified Chinese players, earning an overall "overwhelmingly positive" rating, with most players highly appreciating its lighthearted and humorous atmosphere and the exhilarating "search, fight, and extract" experience. 《逃离鸭科夫》目前已收获超过 1 万条简体中文玩家的评论，获得「好评如潮」的总体评价，大部分玩家对其轻松搞笑的氛围和「搜打撤」的爽快体验给予高度认可。

However, in terms of media reviews, the game's reputation shows some divergence. According to Xiaoheihui, among the 5 media reviews collected by M Station, 2 gave positive reviews and 3 gave lower ratings, resulting in an average score of 74. 不过，在媒体评价方面，游戏口碑存在一定分化。据小黑盒报道，M 站收录的 5 家媒体评测中，2 家给出好评，3 家评价偏低，最终均分为 74 分。

Among them, GameGrin gave it 85 points, believing that although the work parodies "Escape from Tarkov," it is easy to pick up and has a unique style; DualShockers, however, only gave it 70 points, pointing out that the mission design was slightly tedious and lacked excitement, but still acknowledged its cute art style and reasonable pricing. 其中，GameGrin 打出 85 分，认为作品虽恶搞《逃离塔科夫》，但上手容易且风格独特；而 DualShockers 则仅给出 70 分，指出任务设计略显拖沓、刺激感不足，但仍认可其可爱画风与合理定价。

Meanwhile, a Guosen Securities research report suggests that with the new product cycle, a shift in regulatory policies, and the promotion of AI applications, the overall prosperity of the gaming industry is expected to continue to improve.
